categories: Category:The Star Wars Holiday Special actors

nodes.text: Don Francks (February 28, 1932 – April 3, 2016) was a Canadian actor who voiced Jann Tosh and Gir Kybo Ren-Cha on Star Wars Droids and an X-marked Dulok, Umwak and an O-marked Dulok on Ewoks. He also voiced Boba Fett in Droids and the "Story of the Faithful Wookiee" segment of The Star Wars Holiday Special. He was the father of Cree Summer. Francks has appeared on other shows like Inspector Gadget, Mister Rogers' Neighborhood, X-Men, and The Neverending Story.
